Html:
I wanted to know whether I will be able to use WPF Dynamic Data Display to plot Electrocardiograms in real-time with a very good performance?

I am researching the feasibility of WPF as a technology for this purpose.

Your prompt response will be highly appreciated.

Probably it will be ok, you just have to try it.

If you have a healthy budget and require formal support, and don't mind using a library written in DirectX (so, the performance will be faster), check out http://arction.com/.
